var token = jsonData.data; // Update 'jsonData.data' if the structure is different
console.error("Token not found in the response");
return; // Exit if token is not found
// Save the JWT token to the environment variable
// Decode JWT to get the payload (error handling added)
var base64Url = token.split('.')[1]; // Get the payload part of the JWT (second part)
return null; // Return null if parsing fails
// Decode the JWT to extract the payload
// Save the user ID from the decoded JWT payload to the environment variable
pm.environment.set("userId", decodedJwt.userId); // Adjust 'userId' based on your JWT structure
